items.description: Creates a new Scanner instance to read barcodes, QR codes, etc., using the device's camera. It uses the Html5-QRCode library.
To continuously scan multiple codes, set the `multiple` option to `true`. You can then handle each scanned code in the `on_scan` callback.
If you have an instance of the scanner, you can programmatically stop the scanning process by calling this method.
items.example:
// Assuming 'scanner' is an instance from the previous example
scanner.stop_scan();
